name: Dino Run (The Anonymous Game Company)
description:
Press Space to make your Dino Jump!

Double Jump Allowed

Press the escape key to pause whilst in game!

This Game is currently in Beta, bug Fixes and music coming soon!

Dinosaur sprite made by: https://pzuh.itch.io/

Scorpion sprite made by: https://free-game-assets.itch.io/
